Megaton continued his grimacing smile as he listened to his donor speak. The
dragon now knew that Megatron was smarter than he'd given him credit for.
"I'm afraid you have misinterpreted the intentions of my words. I was
speaking as a warning to anyone who would dare cross me." He was surprised
that Megatron had recognised him as a clone.

Knowing he'd need a smaller form he transformed to T-Rex form. Even without
his enormous dragon mode he stood taller than his donor. This made him feal
superior and in control. He still kept an eye out for trouble. The mutant
knew that if the situations were reversed that Megatron wouldn't settle for
the rank of assault commander.
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 8:15 AM
Subject: Crossing Paths


>     Nighteyes pokes up from the bush. She had known this was going to
> happen...but seeing as how she was out numbered....
>     "Well, if it isnt the mighty and all powerful Killfest. Its so nice to
> see you here. Where exactly are you guys headed?" She asked, her hands
raised
> above her head, weapons on the ground, and a cocky tone in her voice.
>
>     Megatron shook his head at Megaton. "Dont threaten me you sorry excuse
> for a clone. Come on, we need to return to base. Aerostreak, go and
rendevous
> with Nighteyes. Report back on her progress."
>     Aerostreak nodded and transformed into a hawlk. He soard into the sky
and
> headed to Nighteyes location.
>
>     Ominous tapped Quasar awake. The operation was over, she was now a
full
> functioning Energonian. Weather or not she wanted to be one wasnt an
issue.
> If she decided to leave Ominous, she wouldnt live past a week. Her Liquid
> Energon fule tank would drain, leaving her dead.
>     "Wake up Quasar. We have errands to run."
>
>     Akron saw Darkmouse...and the other bots. They had just captured
another
> Predacon. She didnt understand why the Predacons were fighting amongst
each
> other....but then agian she didnt understand half the things going on in
the
> war.
>     "Darkmouse, your going to have to come with me weather you like it or
> not..." She whispered to herself. Her hand began to glow with an Energon
> bolt...if she hit Darkmouse at the base of her neck, she could send her
right
> into stasis quickly. And, she hoped, the Predacons were using Plasma guns,
> because she could absorb the plasma.
>     She shot out from behinde the a tree, her hand held out in front of
her,
> and blasted a bolt at Darkmouse. Eyes wide and alert, she went tense,
ready
> to engage in a fight.
>
>
>
>
